body_html:
i ran with --verbose_failures, looks like hash.h is missing.

[brett@localhost tensorflow]$ bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package --verbose_failures
INFO: Found 1 target...
INFO: From Compiling google/protobuf/src/google/protobuf/compiler/parser.cc [for host]:
google/protobuf/src/google/protobuf/compiler/parser.cc:38:40: fatal error: google/protobuf/stubs/hash.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.

  (cd /home/brett/.cache/bazel/_bazel_brett/cad5cb2acfc6cd577d8180fb5b9f9a6b/tensorflow && \
  exec env - \
    PATH=/usr/lib64/qt-3.3/bin:/usr/lib64/ccache:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/home/brett/.local/bin:/home/brett/bin \
  /usr/bin/gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE '-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=1' -fstack-protector -Wall -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object -fno-omit-frame-pointer -g0 -O2 -DNDEBUG -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -g0 '-std=c++0x' -iquote . -iquote bazel-out/host/genfiles -iquote external/bazel_tools -iquote bazel-out/host/genfiles/external/bazel_tools -isystem google/protobuf/src -isystem bazel-out/host/genfiles/google/protobuf/src -isystem external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/gcc3 -DHAVE_PTHREAD -Wall -Wwrite-strings -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-sign-compare '-Wno-error=unused-function' -no-canonical-prefixes -Wno-builtin-macro-redefined '-D__DATE__="redacted"' '-D__TIMESTAMP__="redacted"' '-D__TIME__="redacted"' '-frandom-seed=bazel-out/host/bin/google/protobuf/_objs/protobuf/google/protobuf/src/google/protobuf/compiler/parser.o' -MD -MF bazel-out/host/bin/google/protobuf/_objs/protobuf/google/protobuf/src/google/protobuf/compiler/parser.d -c google/protobuf/src/google/protobuf/compiler/parser.cc -o bazel-out/host/bin/google/protobuf/_objs/protobuf/google/protobuf/src/google/protobuf/compiler/parser.o): gcc failed: error executing command 
  (cd /home/brett/.cache/bazel/_bazel_brett/cad5cb2acfc6cd577d8180fb5b9f9a6b/tensorflow && \
  exec env - \
    PATH=/usr/lib64/qt-3.3/bin:/usr/lib64/ccache:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/home/brett/.local/bin:/home/brett/bin \

i ran with --verbose_failures, looks like `hash.h` is missing.
